com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.regex

Interface ISCRegexErrorMessageProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCDefaultRegexErrorMessageProvider

    public interface ISCRegexErrorMessageProvider
    All regular expression error mesasage providers will need to implement this interface. asmishra

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getBlacklistErrorMessage(SCRegularExpression regularExpression, java.lang.String applicationId)
      Returns error message for given regular expression object when blacklist validation fails.
      java.lang.String getBlacklistErrorMessage(java.lang.String pattern, java.lang.String applicationId)
      Returns error message for given pattern when blacklist validation fails.
      java.lang.String getWhitelistErrorMessage(SCRegularExpression regularExpression, java.lang.String applicationId)
      Returns error message for given regular expression object when whitelist validation fails.
      java.lang.String getWhitelistErrorMessage(java.lang.String pattern, java.lang.String applicationId)
      Returns error message for given pattern when whitelist validation fails.
      void init(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      This method initializes the provider.

        void init(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
